data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Jeollabuk-do, South Korea with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jeollabuk-do, South Korea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 306,214 believers in the state of Jeollabuk-do.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Jeollabuk-do prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,871,700 people living in Jeollabuk-do, South Korea. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Burmese people.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Jeollabuk-do, South Korea.
Father, help your children in Jeollabuk-do, South Korea find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Jeollabuk-do, South Korea.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

location.name: Jeollabuk-do
location.people_groups_list: South Asian, general, Turk, Kazakh, Japanese, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: South Asian, general (101,000), Turk (1,700), Kazakh (12,000), Japanese (52,000), Vietnamese (151,000)
